title: Bask in luxury at Residences on Bedford. The finest in upscale living.
posting_body: ['Residences on Bedford - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 3 / Bath: 1', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1128 sq ft', 'Rent: $2639 - $2835/Month', 'Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', '(203) 208-3262', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'At The Residences on Bedford, our mission is to make home synonymous with luxury.', 'Our charming apartment community in Stamford features contemporary finishes, eye-catching kitchens, and spacious living areas, providing you the convenience of an apartment and comfort of a home.', 'Plus, our Stamford apartment complex features resort-style amenities and a central location to make living feel like luxury.', "We're proudly accepting new tenants.", 'Contact us today!', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '● Abundant Closet Space', '● Air Conditioning', '● Balcony', '● Blinds', '● Garage', '● Gas Ranges', '● Large, Private Balconies', '● Spectacular Views in Select Units', '● Stainless Steel appliances in Select Units', '● Storage Units', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● 24 Hour Convenience Store', '● Bowling Alley', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Fitness Center', '● On-Site Park', '● Parks Nearby', '● Pet Friendly', '● Play Area', '● Pool', '● 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '● Beautiful Picnic Areas', '● Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '● Elegant Clubroom', '● Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '● Ice Skating Rink **Winter Only', '● Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '● Near Downtown Stamford', '● Online Payments Available', 'Contact Info:', '(203) 208-3262', '1425 Bedford St', 'Stamford, CT 06905', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '8E5BBE37CCEE40']
